com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event

Class MleEventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event.MleEventDispatcher

  • public class MleEventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    MleEventDispatcher is used to synchronize the dispatching of Magic Lantern runtime events.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MleEventDispatcher()
      The default constructor.
      MleEventDispatcher(int capacity)
      A constructor that initializes the capacity of the number of event groups.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MleEventDispatcher

        public MleEventDispatcher()
        The default constructor.

        The default number of groups is set to 10.

      • MleEventDispatcher

        public MleEventDispatcher(int capacity)
        A constructor that initializes the capacity of the number of event groups.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The number of event groups.

    • Method Detail

      • installEventCB

        public IMleCallbackId installEventCB(int event,
                                     IMleEventCallback callback,
                                     java.lang.Object clientData)
                              throws MleRuntimeException
        Install a callback for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        callback - The callback to install.
        clientData - Client data associated with the dispatch of the callback.
        Returns:
        A callback identifier is returned. This may be used to uniquely identify a specific callback for a particular event.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the callback can not be installed successfully.

      • uninstallEvent

        public boolean uninstallEvent(int event)
                       throws MleRuntimeException
        Uninstall all callbacks associated with the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the event is successfully uninstalled. Otherwise, false will be returned indicating that the specified event is invalid or could not be uninstalled.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the callbacks can not be removed from the priority queue.

      • enableEvent

        public boolean enableEvent(int event)
        Enable the specified event for dispatching.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the event is succussfull enabled. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • disableEvent

        public boolean disableEvent(int event)
        Disable the specified event for dispatching.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the event is succussfull disabled. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • uninstallEventCB

        public boolean uninstallEventCB(int event,
                                IMleCallbackId id)
        Uninstall the specified callback associated with the given event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        id - The identifier for the callback to uninstall.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the callback is successfully uninstalled. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • enableEventCB

        public boolean enableEventCB(int event,
                             IMleCallbackId id)
        Enable the specified callback associated with the given event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        id - The identifier for the callback to enable.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the callback is successfully enabled. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • disableEventCB

        public boolean disableEventCB(int event,
                              IMleCallbackId id)
        Disable the specified callback associated with the given event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        id - The identifier for the callback to disable.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the callback is successfully enabled. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • changeCBPriority

        public boolean changeCBPriority(int event,
                                IMleCallbackId id,
                                int key)
        Change the priority of the callback for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        id - The callback identifier.
        key - The new priority.
        Returns:
        If the callback priority is successfully changed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • changeEventPriority

        public boolean changeEventPriority(int event,
                                   int key)
        Change the dispatch priority for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - The composite event identifier.
        key - The new priority.
        Returns:
        If the event priority is successfully changed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • dispatchEvents

        public void dispatchEvents()
        Dispatch all events that have been placed in the delayed queue.

      • processEvent

        public boolean processEvent(int id,
                            java.lang.Object calldata,
                            short type,
                            int priority)
        Process the event specified by the event id.

        If the event type associated with the id is MLE_EVENT_IMMDIATE, then the event will dispatched immediately. If the event type is MLE_EVENT_DELAYED, then the event will be placed on a priority queue to be processed at a later date (when dispatchEvents() is called).

        The event will be dispatched with the specified priority if the event type is MLE_EVENT_DELAYED.

        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        calldata - An Object containing the data to be processed along with the event.
        type - The type of dispatching to use.
        priority - The event dispatch priority.
        Returns:
        If the event is successfully processed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • processEvent

        public boolean processEvent(int id,
                            java.lang.Object calldata,
                            short type)
        Process the event specified by the event id.

        If the event type associated with the id is MLE_EVENT_IMMEDIATE, then the event will dispatched immediately. If the event type is MLE_EVENT_DELAYED, then the event will be placed on a priority queue to be processed at a later date (when dispatchEvents() is called).

        The event will be dispatched with the default priority if the event type is MLE_EVENT_DELAYED.

        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        calldata - An Object containing the data to be processed along with the event.
        type - The type of dispatching to use.
        Returns:
        If the event is successfully processed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush the delayed dispatch queue. All pending events will be ignored.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(IMleEventListener listener)
        Add an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The event listener to notify when events are processed and/or dispatched.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(IMleEventListener listener)
        Remove an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The event listener to remove.
